questions.explanation: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.

questions.questionText: Which HTML element is used to define a hyperlink?
questions.explanation: The <a> element is used to define a hyperlink in HTML.

questions.questionText: What is the correct HTML element for the largest heading?
questions.explanation: The <h1> element is used for the largest heading in HTML.

questions.questionText: Which HTML element is used to display an unordered list?
questions.explanation: The <ul> element is used to display an unordered list in HTML.

questions.questionText: What is the correct HTML element for inserting a line break?
questions.explanation:
The
element is used to insert a line break in HTML.

questions.questionText: Which attribute is used to specify the URL of an image in HTML?
questions.explanation: The 'src' attribute is used to specify the URL of an image in HTML.

questions.questionText: Which HTML element is used to define a table row?
questions.explanation: The <tr> element is used to define a table row in HTML.

questions.questionText: What is the correct HTML element for bold text?
questions.explanation: The <b> element is used for bold text in HTML.

questions.questionText: Which HTML element is used to define a footer for a document or section?
questions.explanation: The <footer> element is used to define a footer for a document or section in HTML.
